title: "As facial recognition arrives in schools, Montana enters uncharted territory"
excerpt: "Facial recognition technology has been put into at least one school district in Montana. The surveillance, characterized as a safety tool, is in use as policy makers in Montana debate how to regulate that kind of technology."
